Title: Requires automated external defibrillator equipment to be immediately available at school-sponsored events
Summary: Requires automated external defibrillator equipment to be immediately available at school-sponsored events; requires school districts, boards of cooperative educational services, county vocational education and extension boards and charter schools to develop and implement a cardiac emergency response plan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring automated external defibrillator equipment to be immediately available at school-sponsored events
